TopicTitle: The most annoying forum registration process

Articles.Content:
http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/

For some reason, their captcha is failing, I have tried to contact their forum administrator through email but they didn't answer, I have entered the correct captcha yet it still fail every time I tried to register, until it says that I exceeded the amount of registration attempts.

The problem is, my router is bricked but according to their installation FAQ my router isn't bricked. And there is nowhere else to ask about that problem except that forum.

This is why NIH syndrome is bad, why make your own captcha while this: http://www.google.com/recaptcha/learnmore works much better. Now, I'm willing to pay someone money to register me to that forum

So, share your own most annoying forum/website registration

I have tried to contact their forum administrator through email but they didn't answer

Maybe their router is knackered...

After one too many problems like that, I found bugmenot, and skip the problem entirely. I just checked and at least one of their profiles (@ bugmenot.com/view/dd-wrt.com work for the site. Good luck with your problem!

It works! Thanks

If only I could add rep here...

Edited April 3, 2014 by Aghanim
